Uses of Package
com.github.wuic.configuration

Packages that use com.github.wuic.configuration
com.github.wuic This package is the most general package of the WUIC library. 
com.github.wuic.configuration   
com.github.wuic.configuration.impl This package contains different POJO which could be used to represent the Configuration implementations. 
com.github.wuic.engine This package contains the definition of an Engine. 
com.github.wuic.engine.impl.ehcache This package contains the engines which are based on the EhCache framework. 
com.github.wuic.engine.impl.embedded This package contains the engines which don't delegate its work to any library like YUI Compressor. 
com.github.wuic.engine.impl.yuicompressor This package contains the engines which are based on the YUI Compressor library. 
com.github.wuic.factory This package contains all the classes that transparently create the Engine implementations. 
com.github.wuic.factory.impl This package contains all the factory classes which provide Engine implementations. 
com.github.wuic.helper.configuration This package defines some class helping the configuration step. 
com.github.wuic.xml This package provides the classes which read the 'wuic.xml' file. 
 

Classes in com.github.wuic.configuration used by com.github.wuic
Configuration
           Represents the possible configuration elements for compression.
SourceRootProvider
           This interface provides access to the files configured in the 'wuic.xml'.
 

Classes in com.github.wuic.configuration used by com.github.wuic.configuration
BadConfigurationException
           A 'BadConfigurationException' is thrown when a Configuration is not properly defined according to the need of the class which uses it.
Configuration
           Represents the possible configuration elements for compression.
PackingConfiguration
           Bin packing configuration interface.
YuiConfiguration
           Represents the possible configuration elements for script compression using the YUI Compressor library.
 

Classes in com.github.wuic.configuration used by com.github.wuic.configuration.impl
BadConfigurationException
           A 'BadConfigurationException' is thrown when a Configuration is not properly defined according to the need of the class which uses it.
Configuration
           Represents the possible configuration elements for compression.
DomConfigurationBuilder
           This interface represents a builder that can produce a Configuration using a configuration Node read from the 'wuic.xml' file.
ImageConfiguration
           This interface describes a configuration for image groups.
PackingConfiguration
           Bin packing configuration interface.
SpriteConfiguration
           Sprite configuration interface.
WuicEhcacheProvider
           This interface defines an object which provides a Cache from EHCache framework.
YuiConfiguration
           Represents the possible configuration elements for script compression using the YUI Compressor library.
YuiCssConfiguration
           Represents the possible configuration elements for CSS compression using the YUI Compressor library.
YuiJavascriptConfiguration
           Represents the possible configuration elements for Javascript compression using the YUI Compressor library.
